headline: State Street Appoints Majed Al Hassoun as Head of KSA and Bahrain
summary: RIYADH, Saudi Arabia, December 16, 2024--State Street Corporation (NYSE: STT) today announced the appointment of Majed Al Hassoun as Country Head Saudi Arabia and Bahrain, to drive and execute the firm’s Investment Services and Global Advisors strategy.
